SELECT t.ORDER_STATUS AS status, t.ORDER_STATUS AS cname, count(1) as cnt FROM T_FAULT_INFO d LEFT JOIN T_FAULT_ORDER t ON d.FAULT_NO=t.FAULT_NO WHERE d.DELETE_FLAG='0' AND d.FAULT_FLAG <> '2'
AND d.MAJOR_CODE IN (
#{major}
)
AND to_date(d.FILLIN_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')>=to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
AND to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')>=to_date(d.FILLIN_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
GROUP BY t.ORDER_STATUS ORDER BY cnt DESC

SELECT * FROM T_FLOW_TASK WHERE USER_ID=#{userId} and TODO_STATUS=#{type} ORDER BY KIND_TYPE ASC
, TASK_RCV_TIME DESC
, TODO_DATE DESC

with todoSize AS (select count(*) as todoSize from T_FLOW_TASK where USER_ID=#{userId} and TODO_STATUS='1'), overSize as (select count(*) as overSize from T_FLOW_TASK where USER_ID=#{userId} and TODO_STATUS='2') SELECT * FROM todoSize, overSize
